translations: 理解（perceive 的 ing 形式）；察觉

sentences.sentence: Just perceiving norms is enough to cause people to adjust their behavior in the direction of the crowd.
sentences.translation: 仅仅是感知到规范就足以使人们调整他们的行为，使其朝着和大家一样的方向。

sentences.sentence: Just perceiving norms is enough to cause people to adjust their behaviour in the direction of the crowd.
sentences.translation: 仅仅是感知到规范就足以让人们朝着大家的方向调整自己的行为。

sentences.sentence: So perceiving, remembering, imagining are all internal mental processes that lead to knowing or believing.
sentences.translation: 所以感知、记忆、想象都是内在的心理过程，它们引发了认知或相信。
